---
id: get-game-stats
title: "Get Game Stats"
description: "Get game stats for the corresponding game. Successful request will return a single [Game Stats Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/game-stats-object)."

custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Game Stats"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/games/{game-id}/stats"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get game stats for the corresponding game. Successful request will return a single [Game Stats Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/game-stats-object).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"game-id","in":"path","description":"Game ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":1}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful Request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Game Stats Object","description":"Contains stats data.","properties":{"game_id":{"description":"Unique game id.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":2},"mods_count_total":{"description":"Available mod count for the game.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":13},"mods_downloads_today":{"description":"Last 24hours of mod downloads for the game.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":204},"mods_downloads_total":{"description":"Total mods downloaded for the game.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":27492},"mods_downloads_daily_average":{"description":"Average mods downloaded on a daily basis.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1230},"mods_subscribers_total":{"description":"Total users who have subscribed to the mods for the game.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":16394},"date_expires":{"description":"Unix timestamp until this game's statistics are considered stale.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1492564103}},"type":"object"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
